meanings.definition: A substance or treatment used to relieve or prevent rheumatism.
meanings.sent1: My grandmother takes antirheumatic pills for her arthritis.
meanings.sent2: The doctor prescribed an antirheumatic cream for my joint pain.
meanings.sent3: The antirheumatic medicine made the old man dance like a young boy.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like an antirheumatic, easing the stiffness in the room.
meanings.sent5: The soothing effect of the antirheumatic brought relief to her aching joints.

meanings.definition: Relating to or used in the treatment of rheumatism.
meanings.sent1: The antirheumatic therapy helped reduce the swelling in her joints.
meanings.sent2: She bought antirheumatic gloves to keep her hands warm in winter.
meanings.sent3: The antirheumatic lotion smelled like fresh flowers in a garden.
meanings.sent4: His words had an antirheumatic effect on her mood, calming her down.
meanings.sent5: The antirheumatic properties of the herbal tea eased her rheumatism pain.
